title: Yung LB on Creating Runtz & Jokes Up, Playboi Carti Tour Stories & More
description:
Yung LB talks about building his brand, his empire, always moving forward, finding new ideas and what he has in the works. ----- 00:00 Intro 16:27 Used to sip lean heavy back then, it used the most praised dr*g, LB says not that much anymore 20:37 The passing of his mentor and big bro Jack 21:53 The Cookies Boys, rockin the brand on tour to support bro 24:13 Not getting paid for rockin Cookies brand and ultimately creating a buzz + Opening for Playboi Carti reppin Cookies super hard around 2017 25:11 Meeting Carti on tour, didn't know who he was back then 27:38 Going on tour with his label Keep it Lit, selling out 22 shows outta 24 29:56 Started Runtz brand, Runtz coz it tastes like candy 37:56 LB is not giving the game for free at all! 39:11 LB is building a brand, w**d is just a small part of it, Runtz everything 41:26 Opened a dispensary on Ventura Blvd 41:51 How the meme of the fake Runtz helped the real brand: "Obama Runtz was fake! We made a song out of it tho" 45:57 LB and Desto Dubb are like twins 46:51 How he took Benny HIbachi from 100 followers to becoming the most lit food truck in LA 48:20 Getting Hibachi plates delivered at the strip club 50:32 Got a deal with Cookies against his will so he started and pushed his own thing: "Joke's up" 54:50 It's all about the brand, corporations will come eventually, built a household name in 4 years 57:47 Got his IG deleted on 420 and never posted weed on there ----- NO JUMPER PATREON http://www.patreon.com/nojumper CHECK OUT OUR NEW SPOTIFY PLAYLIST https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5te... FOLLOW US ON SNAPCHAT FOR THE LATEST NEWS & UPDATES https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_... CHECK OUT OUR ONLINE STORE!!! http://www.nojumper.com/ SUBSCRIBE for new interviews (and more) weekly: http://bit.ly/nastymondayz  Follow us on SPOTIFY: https://open.spotify.com/show/4ENxb4B... iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/n... Follow us on Social Media: https://www.snapchat.com/discover/No_... http://www.twitter.com/nojumper http://www.instagram.com/nojumper https://www.facebook.com/NOJUMPEROFFI... http://www.reddit.com/r/nojumper JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Q3XPfBm Follow Adam22: https://www.tiktok.com/@adam22 http://www.twitter.com/adam22 http://www.instagram.com/adam22 adam22hoe on Snapchat
